articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: EURO2020: a félpályáról meglőtték a torna gólját – Videó - Goal.com
articles.description: The 2021 Euros feature 24 teams vying for the European Championship for national teams. The tournament starts off with a round-robin group stage followed by knockout rounds through the final on July 11. Check out the latest standings and results.

articles.author: Natasha Lomas
articles.title: Europe needs to back browser-level controls to fix cookie consent nightmares, says privacy group - TechCrunch

articles.title: Raheem Sterling goal gives England 1-0 win over Croatia at European Championships - Wide World of Sports
articles.description: But team booed by own fans before kick-off
articles.content:
Raheem Sterling grew up in the shadow of Wembley Stadium as it was being rebuilt, even getting a tattoo of its famous arch on his left forearm.

articles.author: CNA
articles.title: Football: Sterling gives England opening Euro 2020 win over Croatia - CNA
articles.description: LONDON: Raheem Sterling finally found his tournament touch when his 61st-minute goal gave England a deserved 1-0 win over Croatia at Wembley on Sunday (Jun 13) as they began a European Championship with a victory for the first time in nine attempts.
